Name: Cosmopolis cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of flamed orange zest.
Review: A riff on a Cosmopolitan with the distinctive Greek influence of mastiha.
History: For more recipes, origins and history behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail, see our Cosmopolitan page .
Nutrition: One serving of Cosmopolis cocktail contains 118 calories
